testcase.name: should set the user language to the Accepted-Language header if is supportedin the domain
should set the user language to the default language of the domain if it is supportedand the Accepted-Language is not accepted by the domain
should set the user language from the config if Accepted-Language is not supported and domain is not existing
should set the default language to the Accepted-Language header if is supported and the domain is not set
should set in the session the accepted languages regarding the base config
